tool_description: A RESTful Interface to Unicode Data, this API gives easy and standardized access to all information from Codepoints.net. The detailed documentation is [available on Github](https://github.com/Boldewyn/Codepoints.net/wiki/API).
name: Unicode Codepoints
title: Unicode Codepoints

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for Codepoints. This API exposes the functionality of the main site’s search.

required_parameters.name: properties
required_parameters.description: one or several key/value pairs of Unicode properties or int for decimal codepoint values or q for free text search.

api_list.name: Property
api_list.description: Show one Property for All Codepoints
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://codepoints.p.rapidapi.com/property/block"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codepoints.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://codepoints.p.rapidapi.com/property/{property}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codepoints.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Glyph
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://codepoints.p.rapidapi.com/glyph/0A2F"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codepoints.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://codepoints.p.rapidapi.com/glyph/{codepoint}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codepoints.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Filter
api_list.description: Filter a String, e.g. , by Unicode version or only uppercase letters

required_parameters.name: properties
required_parameters.description: any Unicode property. Appending a "!" negates it.

api_list.name: Name
Codepoint
api_list.description: show detailed information about a single codepoint. You can specify fields of interest with the “property” parameter: codepoint/1234?property=age,uc,lc

required_parameters.name: codepoint
required_parameters.description: The hex number of the codepoint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://codepoints.p.rapidapi.com/codepoint/0A2F"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codepoints.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://codepoints.p.rapidapi.com/codepoint/{codepoint}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codepoints.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Script

required_parameters.name: script
required_parameters.description: One or more ISO 15924 script codes separated by comma

api_list.name: Block
Transform
api_list.description: Transform a String, e.g. , to upper-case, NFC, NFD, …

required_parameters.name: action
required_parameters.description: the action to be applied to {data}, one of 'lower', 'upper', 'title', 'mirror', 'nfc', 'nfd', 'nfkc', 'nfkd'

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: The string to apply the transformation

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://codepoints.p.rapidapi.com/transform/upper/abcde"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codepoints.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://codepoints.p.rapidapi.com/transform/{action}/{data}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codepoints.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Plane
